Spica.name: Spica
Spica.description: A fixed ship that cannot move on its own.

Shrink.name: Shrink
Shrink.description: Remove scaffold and merge rightmost part to the left.

Shrink_Flipped.name: Shrink
Shrink_Flipped.description: Remove scaffold and merge leftmost part to the right.

FixedStar.name: FIXED STAR
description: At the start of your turn, add <c=card>Shrink</c> to your hand.
Evade will move the cannon instead of the ship

Albireo.name: Albireo
Albireo.description: A double tempered ship that harness the energy of double stars.

DoubleStar.name: DOUBLE STAR
description: <c=downside>Deactivates orange parts when it is on the left side, deactivates blue parts when it is on the right side.</c>
If all blue parts were inactive, <c=action>all cards do its action twice</c> and <c=downside>gain 1 less energy next turn</c>
If all orange parts were inactive, <c=action>all attacks generates</c> <c=status>Stun</c> and gain 1 more energy next turn
If there is a Binary Star, artifact is temporarily disabled.
